context.p: You need an account to use the Facebook web application for the first time.

step.cmd: In the Facebook login page, select Create new account to display the Sign Up dialogue box.
In the Sign Up dialogue box, enter the following details:

ul.li: First name: Enter your first name.
Mobile number or email address: Enter your mobile number or email address.
Date of birth: Enter your date of birth using the date, month, and year dropdown.

Gender: Select an option from Female, Male, and Custom. If you select Custom, select an option from the Select your pronoun dropdown and enter your gender.Entering your gender in the Gender field is optional.

step.cmd: Enter the code sent in the confirmation dialogue box to confirm your email address or mobile number.
(Optional) Select the Send Email Again option if you did not receive the code the first time.
(Optional) Select Send Message Again if you entered your mobile number.
Instead, if you want to update the contact information, perform the following steps:

ol.li: In the Add email address or mobile number dialogue box, enter your email address or phone number.

Click Add.
Now, you can verify using the email address or phone number that you recently added.

step.cmd: In the Account confirmed dialogue box, click Ok.
